title: David Kelley, Co-Founder Of IDEO
description: Host Jessica Harris talks with David Kelley, the co-founder of IDEO, a global design firm. Harris also talks with Emily Weiss, founder of Glossier.
itunes:title: David Kelley, Co-Founder Of IDEO
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Host Jessica Harris talks with David Kelley, the co-founder of IDEO, a global design firm. Harris also talks with Emily Weiss, founder of Glossier.
